lexUnit.name: notification.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: notifying, informing, typically in a formal or official manner

sentence.text: Following notification by the Seller to the Purchaser of such cause , the Seller shall be allowed a reasonable extension of time for the performance of its obligations .

The Commission must copy a notification to the relevant authorities in the member states and provided that it is complete , immediately publish brief details of it in the Official Journal .
